mandatory_structure.line_4_plus:
## [Emoji] [Section Title]
[Content with bullets]
[BLANK LINE between sections]

formatting_rules: Line 2 MUST be: 🗒️ READ MORE: [blog URL]
Use ## for section headers (NOT bold, NOT ###)
Blank line after READ MORE before first section
